Entries.3073010/o Wizard/k 3073011/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.${{e1}}"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "Have I ever told you I used to be married?${{e3}}"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "Strange, I know... for a man like me. But it's true."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away.${{e2}}"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...${{e2}}"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic."/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!${{e10}}#$b#I need that magic ink back!${{e11}}#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I can't see her again. That's why I need your help.${{e10}}"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!${{e3}}"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end warpOut
Entries.3073011/O Wizard/k 3073010 529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.${{e1}}"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "I have told you, I believe, of my ex-wife."/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "I would prefer not to remember her in your presence. Or at all, for that matter.${{e3}}"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "And yet I must. For I have a favor to ask of you."/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "After we split, her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path..."/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.${{e2}}"/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for she took my magic ink!${{e10}}#$b#I need that magic ink back!${{e11}}#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I cannot face her. That's why I need your help.${{e10}}"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "Perhaps it is cowardly of me to ask this of you, and yet I have no where else to turn. Please, @. My heart.${{e10}}"/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "Will you do this for me?"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#Of course I will! #Wow. You're asking me to face your ex-wife for you? No thanks."/fork rejectQuest/emote Wizard 20/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah, @! Thank you. Truly. I am immeasurably grateful.${{e1}}"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.${{e3}}"/pause 500/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "Thank you again, my love.${{e9}}"/pause 500/animate Wizard true true 100 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/stopAnimation Wizard 12/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 1500/speak Wizard "I would be lost without you.${{e1}}#$b#I will see you at home${{e9}}pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 3000/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/addQuest 28/friendship Wizard 100/end warpOut
Entries.rejectQuest: pause 1500/speak Wizard "Ah...${{e10}}#$b#I suppose you are correct. I had no right to ask.${{e2}}"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "In that case, forget I ever spoke of it. I'm sure I will make do.${{e11}}#$b#I will see you at home.${{e10}}"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 3000/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/friendship Wizard -500/end warpOut

Entries.3073012/n hasPickedUpMagicInk/o Wizard/k: WizardSong/2 14/farmer 3 14 3 Wizard 1 14 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You've found my ink! Excellent.${{e1}}"/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Er...${{e2}}"/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "Did you... happen to see my ex-wife?${{e2}}#$b#No? Well, what about her house...?#$b#Do you think she lives alone? Or...${{e1}}"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "...Actually, don't tell me... I don't want to know."/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Anyway... you must be wondering about your reward. Here..."/move Wizard -1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "It's a book of summoning.#$b#The arcane potential is immense... but I'll make it simple for you.#$b#By using this book, you can summon magic buildings directly to your farm.#$b#I think you'll find it useful.${{e1}}"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Oh, I almost forgot to say... ahem... Thank you."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 800/end
Entries.3073013/n hasPickedUpMagicInk/O Wizard/k: sweet/2 16/farmer 9 24 0 Wizard 3 13 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "@! My heart.${{e1}}#$b#You have the ink?${{e1}}"/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer -6 0 3/move farmer 0 -4 1/move Wizard 0 1 3/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It shames me still to have sent you on such a task...${{e2}}"/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "I hope it was not too taxing for you.#$b#Did you encounter her?#$b#No?${{e3}}#$b#Small blessings.${{e1}}"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "I admit I was concerned.#$b#But no matter. It went smoothly and for that I am eternally grateful.${{e7}}"/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "While you were gone it occurred to me I have a tome which might be of use to you."/move Wizard 0 -1 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "It is a book of summoning and its arcane potential is immense."/pause 500/move Wizard 0 1 3/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Wizard "Here, let me teach you.${{e1}}#$b#By using this book, you will learn to summon magic buildings directly to your farm.${{e9}}#$b#Unfortunately, it still requires gold for the ritual itself.${{e10}}"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Wizard "Consider it a small token of my love for you.${{e1}}"/pause 1000/animate Wizard true true 100 28/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 10/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite heart 3 13/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/stopAnimation Wizard 12/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard 2 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "I only wish I could do more.${{e9}}"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.3073010/o Wizard/k 3073011/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.${{e1}}"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "Have I ever told you about the Witch that resides in Stardew Valley?${{e3}}"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "While I am the sole resident magical practioner of Stardew Valley on paper.#$b#Others like me may live here, shirking the responsbilities of a resident magical practioner, for as long as the Ministry doesn't catch on."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "The Witch I spoke of used to be a classmate of mine back in my youth.#$b#Overtime we became friends and allies, many times would we cover each others backs on the battle field of wars past.${{e3}}#$b#However one day, one of our missions went gravely wrong.#$b#She suffered great tragedy, some that I fear I may have been able to prevent.${{e2}}"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...${{e2}}"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic."/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... because I have reason to believe she took my magic ink.${{e10}}#$b#I need that magic ink back!${{e11}}#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I worry she may still hold a grudge. That's why I need your help.${{e10}}"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!${{e3}}"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end warpOut
